mapper.sql:
temp_par_suppliers_contact.supplier_contact_id as temp_par_suppliers_contact_supplier_contact_id, temp_par_suppliers_contact.contact_type_id as temp_par_suppliers_contact_contact_type_id, temp_par_suppliers_contact.supplier_id as temp_par_suppliers_contact_supplier_id, temp_par_suppliers_contact.name as temp_par_suppliers_contact_name, temp_par_suppliers_contact.sex as temp_par_suppliers_contact_sex, temp_par_suppliers_contact.department as temp_par_suppliers_contact_department, temp_par_suppliers_contact.post as temp_par_suppliers_contact_post, temp_par_suppliers_contact.responsible_business as temp_par_suppliers_contact_responsible_business, temp_par_suppliers_contact.work_phone as temp_par_suppliers_contact_work_phone, temp_par_suppliers_contact.mobile_telephone as temp_par_suppliers_contact_mobile_telephone, temp_par_suppliers_contact.fax as temp_par_suppliers_contact_fax, temp_par_suppliers_contact.postcode as temp_par_suppliers_contact_postcode, temp_par_suppliers_contact.home_phone as temp_par_suppliers_contact_home_phone, temp_par_suppliers_contact.home_adress as temp_par_suppliers_contact_home_adress, temp_par_suppliers_contact.msn as temp_par_suppliers_contact_msn, temp_par_suppliers_contact.qq as temp_par_suppliers_contact_qq, temp_par_suppliers_contact.birthday as temp_par_suppliers_contact_birthday, temp_par_suppliers_contact.hobby as temp_par_suppliers_contact_hobby, temp_par_suppliers_contact.remark as temp_par_suppliers_contact_remark, temp_par_suppliers_contact.enabled as temp_par_suppliers_contact_enabled, temp_par_suppliers_contact.creater as temp_par_suppliers_contact_creater, temp_par_suppliers_contact.create_time as temp_par_suppliers_contact_create_time, temp_par_suppliers_contact.updater as temp_par_suppliers_contact_updater, temp_par_suppliers_contact.update_time as temp_par_suppliers_contact_update_time
,temp_par_com_contact_type.contact_type_name as temp_par_suppliers_contact_contact_type_name ,temp_suppliers.suppliers_name as temp_par_suppliers_contact_supplier_name

LEFT JOIN t_par_com_contact_type temp_par_com_contact_type ON temp_par_com_contact_type.contact_type_id =temp_par_suppliers_contact.contact_type_id LEFT JOIN t_suppliers temp_suppliers ON temp_suppliers.supplier_id =temp_par_suppliers_contact.supplier_id
